snippet.title: Chaos Island- The Lost World: Jurassic Park
snippet.description:
For the first time ever, watch all of the cutscenes and mission briefing videos from the underrated PC game Chaos Island- The Lost World: Jurassic Park. They all play in the order that they do in the game. Included after the ending is the fun "tutorial" video narrated by John Hammond (Richard Attenborough).

This game features the same voice cast as that of the film it is based on, The Lost World: Jurassic Park. Featuring:

Richard Attenborough as John Hammond
Jeff Goldblum as Ian Malcolm
Julianne Moore as Sarah Harding
Vince Vaughn as Nick Van Owen
Richard Schiff as Eddie Carr
Vanessa Lee Chester as Kelli Curtis
Stephen K. Ratter as Research Assistant

Music by Michael Giacchino. From DreamWorks Interactive. This video is meant to preserve and represent this awesome PC game, one that gives me an incredible amount of nostalgia. I hope others who grew up with it will enjoy it.

NOTE: This is a re-upload of the original video that was once on my personal channel.
